answers.answer: My husband ave I had sex at 24 weeks and it started my labor. Now I'm 29 Weeks and we just try to be careful, not be to rough or have sex for to long. Sometimes I still get small contractions afterwards but wedon't have sex very often either.

You can have Braxton hicks contractions for sure. I had them every time after sex with my first baby. Doctor said it was fine unless they didn't go away. It is very normal.
Thank u all for reply I'm almost 34 weeks & getting a lot of contractions even pressure down there. But it's so hard..even by thinking about it makes me contractions :/
that's normal just be careful and not rough. But sex can jump start labor so just keep that in kind as well
Thanks Proudmommyandwife for reply... I'm gestational diabetes & getting monitor twice a week...definetly don't want to start labor now too early:( well I guess I just have to be patience:)
